text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- King Hassan meets Sheikh Zaid of United Arab Emirates in Rabat.
- Opposition Istiqlal party leader Boucetta says recently adopted constitution is turning point in political life.
- Economy needs new approach to solve structural problems and continue growth.
- Morocco and European Union to negotiate free trade zone agreement details.
- Russian minister of foreign affairs to visit Morocco on September 29.
- Dispute between members of OADP opposition party worsens.
- Morocco dismantles clandestine immigration network in northern town of Larache.
